subTitle: Curious about Amina? Here are some answers to your questions! (Warning: May contain unexpected bursts of creativity)

faqs.question: What exactly is Amina?
faqs.answer: Amina is a playful and creative Discord bot currently in development! She's designed to bring fun, creativity, and a dash of chaos to your server. Think of her as that enthusiastic friend who always has a wild idea up their sleeve!

faqs.question: What features does Amina currently have?
faqs.answer: Amina is still a work in progress, with new features being added regularly. Our dashboard and website are also under development. We'd love help from creative minds and developers to make her even more amazing! Join our community to contribute or watch her grow.

faqs.question: How can I contribute to Amina's development?
faqs.answer: We welcome all kinds of contributions! Whether you're a developer, artist, or just have cool ideas, you can help shape Amina's future. Check out our GitHub repository or join our Discord server to get involved. Don't be shy - Amina loves meeting new friends!

faqs.question: Is Amina ready for my Discord server?
faqs.answer: While Amina is still growing and learning, she's eager to make new friends! Keep in mind that she's in active development, so you might encounter some quirks - but that's part of her charm! Join our testing program to help us improve.

faqs.question: How often does Amina get updates?
faqs.answer: Like any creative soul, Amina is constantly evolving! We're actively working on new features and improvements. Join our Discord server to stay updated on her latest adventures and development progress.

faqs.question: How can I get support or report issues?
faqs.answer: Found a bug or need help? Don't worry! Join our Discord community where our team and other users can help you out. Amina might be quirky, but we take your feedback seriously and are always working to make her better!
